children.structure_process: 1. Pre-understanding → 2. Textual Engagement → 3. Interpretation → 4. Reflection → 5. Application → 6. Revision

children.examples: Biblical exegesis, Theological analysis, Religious text study

children.terminology: 1. Pre-understanding → Prior beliefs and assumptions before interpreting a text
2. Textual Engagement → Close reading and examination of the text itself
3. Interpretation → Deriving meaning and significance from the text
4. Reflection → Considering implications and coherence of interpretation
5. Application → Relating interpretation to lived experience or practice
6. Revision → Adjusting understanding based on new insights or contexts
